org.moeaframework.problem.tsplib

Class DistanceFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.moeaframework.problem.tsplib.DistanceFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CeilingDistance, EuclideanDistance, GeographicalDistance, ManhattanDistance, MaximumDistance, PseudoEuclideanDistance

    public abstract class DistanceFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass of all distance function implementations. This class ensures the two nodes provided to the distance(Node, Node) method are compatible.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceFunction()
      Constructs a new distance function.

      abstract double distance(int length, double[] position1, double[] position2)
      Calculates and returns the distance between the two positions.
      double distance(Node node1, Node node2)
      Computes and returns the distance (or edge weight) between the two specified nodes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistanceFunction

        public DistanceFunction()
        Constructs a new distance function.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        public double distance(Node node1,
                       Node node2)
        Computes and returns the distance (or edge weight) between the two specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        node1 - the first node
        node2 - the second node
        Returns:
        the distance between the two nodes
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the nodes are not the same dimension

      • distance

        public abstract double distance(int length,
                                double[] position1,
                                double[] position2)
        Calculates and returns the distance between the two positions. Implementations should throw an IllegalArgumentException if any preconditions fail.
        Parameters:
        length - the length (or dimension) of the two positions
        position1 - the position of the first node
        position2 - the position of the second node
        Returns:
        the distance between the two positions
